sentence.Network_en: Conclusion Ceftazidime Injection is effective for children acute appendicitis treatment.
sentence.Network_cn: 结论泰得欣在小儿阑尾炎中治疗是有效的.

sentence.Network_en: Methods 26 cases children acute appendicitis were treated by Ceftazidime combining Metronidazole.
sentence.Network_cn: 方法在26例小儿阑尾炎患者中应用泰得欣联合甲硝唑进行保守治疗.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To study the post antibiotic effect ( PAE ) of netilmicin combined with ceftazidime.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的探讨奈替米星与头孢他啶联合应用的抗生素后效应 ( PAE ).
